info.name: Full width TechNet
info.description: Very simple script to return TechNet to a full-width mode without the annoying whitespace on either side. Turns out that for PowerShell commands you really need the extra real estate, even on 1080p screens. This script fixes this.
info.additionalInfo: This doesn't affect the page's responsive nature. It can still adapt to different browser widths. Can definitely be cleaned up by modifying the footer and breadcrumb bar if you need it to.
